message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident that you'll find it to be a game-changer for your business. Would you like to make an offer on this product?
Alice, $2000000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm interested in this product, but I can only offer $800000 at this time. This is my absolute maximum.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $800000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to consider $1400000?

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $1400000 is still out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $1000000. This is a fair compromise, and it would allow both of us to walk away happy.  Let's work together to find a solution.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not sure $1000000 is enough to justify the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm going to propose $1200000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to further negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.

Alice, I'm getting close to my limit, but I can offer $1100000. This is my final offer.  If we can't reach an agreement at this price, I'll have to consider other options. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with $1100000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. I'm going to propose $1300000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
